review:
Dr. Aparna Jha is an absolute expert with loads of empathy, understanding and an endearing attitude. 
In 2022 November , I first consulted Dr. Aparna Jha for a uterine fibroid and pregnancy related concern. She shared her expertise on the fibroid which allayed my fear and guided me on fertility and pregnancy related concerns. Dr. Aparna lend her expertise in every step of my pregnancy journey. She kept a caring eye not only on the fetus but also on the uterine fibroid . Since the uterine fibroid's size increased during the pregnancy , doctor advised that a myomectomy (removal of fibroid) can be done along with c-section which will prevent multiple surgeries. We went ahead with that advise and it was the best decision taken. Just after the c-section delivery , myomectomy was performed to remove the fibroid. I recovered in 2-3 days( in terms of pain and being up and about on my feet). 
I am really thankful and grateful to Dr. Aparna Jha for my smooth pregnancy journey , child delivery and removal of fibroid. I couldn't have received better care from any other doctor.

review:
I have started my first visit with less hopes of completing my maternity and have my own child. It was because I had huge fibroids in my uterus which caused miscarriage once. And I had visited atleast 4-5 doctors who firmly said pregnancy is not possible until fibroids are removed with myomectomy. Even if I undergone surgery they wouldn't promise I can get pregnant again as they saw very less chances.
With all the pain in our life me and my husband decided to try again and leave faith in god. Just after I got positive test results, we have booked our first appointment with Aparna Jha. And first thing she did was making me mentally ready for everything with still asking to keep faith and she would try her best to help us with pregnancy. Here I saw the first difference with other doctors who had concluded my uterus capability on my first visit. Dr.Aparna Jha was supportive, a strong motivator, never gets too much emotional but still understands, prepares the patient physically and mentally. She was available on phone, WhatsApp, online appointment whenever neccessary. Also, on my last day of delivery at midnight 12 where I had water break. I would say she handled all of situations perfectly that I did not even panic with water breaking.

Today, while we are writing this review I have a son of 18 months old who is sleeping in between me and my husband reminding us all of the happy tears when he was born.  We are now living a happy life where we never forget how much Aparna Jha mean go us.
I know is took me so long to write this here, but I say it again she is always comes to our mind.

Fun fact: Me and my husband  call her Appu or Bihar ki Sherni when talk about Dr.Aparna Jha üòâ

Keep us the good work and we meet again when we cross the roads.

Br, 
Sreelekha, Abhilash and Agastya

review:
We had a very bad experience with Apollo Cradle and Dr Aparna Jha wherein my wife developed Preeclampsia and eventually eclampsia without the doctor recognising it. Here is why we wouldn't recommend this place:

1. The hospital doesn't have an ICU for the mother - atleast that's what we were told when my wife had suffered a seizure from eclampsia - so if you need
BP monitoring as a result of pre-eclampsia in an
ICU setting you don't have the option
2. The BP measurement is manual at the OPD which means if you have borderline BP increases the nurses measuring your BP in 30 seconds fall to identify subtle signs of high BP. Prior to my wife developing eclampsia we visited the hospital twice following high BP measurements on home machine but the readings at hospital were "normal" according to nurses
3. ** ****** *** ****** ** ********* ***** ** ************ **** ****** we told her about BP readings at home, feet swelling, rapid weight gain, headache. Her diagnosis was have Dolo and stop measuring BP at home. She didn't even suggest a urine test to look for preeclampsia! She somehow even failed to suggest a 28 week scan that other hospitals recommend. As a result my wife developed pre-eclampsia and eventually eclampsia over new years weekend when the doctor was on leave. We had to do an emergency C section and delivered at 32 weeks ***** **** ********* ******** ****** ** ******** **** * ***** ************ ** ********** Even after high wait times at OPD at this hospital we ended up with this outcome.
Doctor didn't even provide any phone number for expressing any concerns till it was too late.
These maternity hospitals are a factory with 10min consults with the more "sought-after" doctors not being sufficient for anyone to be properly diagnosed.****  * *********** ** **** *** * ********** ********* ******** **** * ******* ********

review: How to start.. she is really a goddess who helped me to deliver my girl baby. From the initial days she encouraged me to have a healthy diet and exercise even before conceiving. In January my pregnancy got confirmed and from day 1 she was there to help me. There was spotting in second and third month but gradually things became fine. She encouraged to have an active life though out my pregnancy which helped in getting my baby head down. On delivery day my water broke and went to hospital around 2 AM still she responded to duty doctors how to handle. They induced me as there were no sign of contractions. It was difficult delivery with little heavier baby and Aparna ensured me to have normal delivery. And removed placenta manually. If anyone else would have been there, they would have done C-Sec but as promised she went with normal delivery(instrument involved). Also she never gave unnecessary tablets or asked for any scans. She recommended only relevant stuff during pregnancy. Even after my delivery when I got gallstones , when we contacted her she responded to undergo surgery. Overall she was so friendly, sweet , available and a hardworking passionate doctor that I have ever seen. Love her a lot. ‚ù§Ô∏è

review:
First of all I would like to thank Dr Aparna for her support and all the important advices throughout the pregnancy.

There are several positive things to say about her. However, the most important thing what we like is the communication. We both are not very open person, still the communication was very clear to us. Before asking any question, doctor had already mentioned the important things, such as, what and when we should take care or do during the pregnancy.**** **** **** ** *********** **** ** **** *** **** **** ****** *** ***** ********** the medication was limited to only what required. Post-pregnancy, the medication that is not required has been discontinued.

We experienced that we can ask anything not only related to physical health but also mental health to her.

During the difficult phase of last trimester, the support and courage that doctor had provided to us was what we will remember for rest of our life.
Finally, after almost 39 weeks, we were gifted with a beautiful baby. 
And overall, we had a very pleasant experience with her.

Thank you Doctor from the bottom of our heart!

review:
Thanks a million times to Dr Aparna Jha ma'am. We are grateful and blessed to have consulted with her for our pregnancy. She made my whole pregnancy journey smooth. I recently delivered a healthy baby girl under her supervision. As first-time parents, we had endless lists of questions at every visit and every single time she would take the time to answer each question with great patience and a smile. She always patiently listened to what I had to say and would always come back with good advice and suggestions. She encouraged me from the very beginning that she will ensure I have a normal delivery. She gave proper advice regarding medication and exercise and all thanks to her I am now a proud mumma of a healthy baby. The way she handled me in the labor ward will be cherished forever. I owe a big thanks to you, mam. 
I will definitely recommend Dr. Aparna to my friends and relatives. Pregnancy is a tough journey and a good gynecologist eases the pre-delivery period with kind words and good medications.

review: I am a patient of Dr Aparna ma'am and got treated by her for more then 1.5 years. First pregnancy was failed due to my cervical incompetence in 21 weeks. Then again after 2 months I was conceived and I was fully taken care by aparna ma'am for full 9 months.my case was very critical as  I have cervix issue. But Aparna ma'am really managed my case like a miracle. By god's grace I am blessed with a baby boy and delivered by aparna ma'am. We feel like she came to our life as a form of God. she is an angel for us . Her words, her way of talking, suggestion, advice everything helped me. She has also shared her WhatsApp number for emergency.i am really thankful for everything she has done for us. In the last days of delivery she was going for vacation and told me she will come after 4 days. But on the same day she checked my length and luckily cervix was opened by 4 cm. And we are blessed with a baby normal delivery. All my gratitude and thanks to aparna ma'am.

review: The best thing that could happen to us during our pregnancy period is none other than Dr. Aparna. The way she handles and eases the stress in the different phases of the pregnancy is extremely commendable. context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Cervical Cerclage,Infertility in Women,
review: We were trying for baby for couple of months and after multiple failed results, we met Aparna mam. She was very clear on how she wanted the analysis and treatment to go.
